When Barack Obama was a candidate and during the transition period, various conversations were held within the staff, but nothing was of interest to me, Colin Powell said. "I would rather be someone the president calls on from time to time for personal advice, without me expecting anything in return or asking for a position," Colin Powell said.

Fox News Watch Saturday 2:30 p et Indiana Congressman Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012. In a letter to supporters he writes; In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been laying the groundwork to seek Indiana's GOP gubernatorial nomination to succeed Republican White House run and working out details with his wife and family. in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! year- revealed on the show today( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. "I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend." Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007.
